name: v10.0.0
body:
# Breaking Changes

* [Move to com.netflix namespace for plugin id](https://github.com/nebula-plugins/gradle-ospackage-plugin/commit/010f8210c6401c04bc0e844de24f173f9a5ec9a4)

name: v9.1.1
body: - Run `postinst` on upgrade, not only install

name: v9.1.0
body:
Improve `mainClass` and `mainClassName` property handling for the Spring Boot Application plugin. Properties are now delegated to in this order:
```
    application.mainClass
    springBoot.mainClass
    springBoot.mainClassName
    mainClassName
```
This provides compatibility with Spring Boot 2.6 as a side-effect.

name: v9.0.0
body: # Breaking change. Gradle 7+ support

name: v8.6.2
body: * `SystemPackagingTask`: Fix `getArchiveVersion().convention` to use a `Property<String>` instead of `Property<Property<String>>`

name: v8.6.1
body: * Update redline library to 1.2.10

name: v8.6.0
body: * Make`SystemPackagingTask` archive file config gradle 7 compatible

name: v8.5.6
body: Move Spring Boot `mainClass` check to `startScripts` rather than a configuration time check, allowing the `boot` distribution to still be used (Background on need for original change https://github.com/gradle/gradle/issues/16371). Remove check for `mainClassName` as it already fails on Gradle 6.3 and earlier.

name: v8.5.5
body: Avoid conflicts between `jar` and `bootJar` tasks because Spring Boot Ospackage plugin enables both.

name: v8.5.4
body: * Improve messaging for missing `mainClass` in Spring Boot apps

name: v8.5.3
body: `OspackageApplicationSpringBootPlugin`: fail build if mainClass/mainClassName are not configured

name: v8.5.2
body: Fix Spring Application compatibility on Gradle releases prior to 6.4

name: v8.5.1
body: If the application `mainClass` has not been configured for a Spring Boot project, use the `mainClassName` from the `springBoot` extension.

name: v8.5.0
body: Switch the Spring Boot ospackage to use the `main` distribution instead of the `boot` distribution. The `boot` fat jar has far worse classloading performance and up to double the startup time. This also provides compatibility with AppCDS on Java 11 and later.

name: v8.4.1
body: * Revert: "feat(jdeb): enable long filename support"

name: v8.4.0
body: Add support for long paths when packaging Debians. Thanks to @jasisk

name: v8.3.1
body: * Remove `CacheableTask` for `Deb` and `Rpm` tasks: The outputs of this task are far too large to be appropriate for caching

name: v8.3.0
body:
* Gradle 6.4 support
* Undefined versions use a default version to enable valid packages - fixes #369

name: v8.2.2
body: Undefined versions use a default version to enable valid packages - fixes #369

name: v8.2.0
body:
Add support for:
* RPM Trigger script declaration
* Declaration of versions for `provides` of virtual packages with version.

name: v8.1.0
body: * Introduce Deprecation logger util for Gradle 6.2+ compatibility

name: v8.0.0
body: * Task configuration avoidance for `Deb` and `Rpm` tasks

name: v7.6.3
body: * Upgrade to redline 1.2.9 to prevent https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JAVA-ORGBOUNCYCASTLE-32412

name: v7.6.2
body: * Set `DuplicateStrategy` to `INCLUDE` to avoid warnings. `INCLUDE` was the previous default value as it came from INHERIT

name: v7.6.1
body: * `SystemPackagingTask`: set duplicate strategy to `DuplicatesStrategy.INHERIT`

name: v7.6.0
body: * ProjectPackagingExtension set duplicate strategy to `DuplicatesStrategy.INHERIT`

name: v7.4.2
body: Fix #347: make `Directory` serializable

name: v7.4.1
body: * Rollback gradle-docker-plugin as it introduced breaking changes to consumers

name: v7.4.0
body:
* Remove `DomainObjectCollectionFactory` and leverage `WrapUtil` from gradle to create `DomainObjectCollection`
* Upgrade `gradle-docker-plugin` to `5.1.0`

name: v7.1.0
body: Add compatibility with Gradle 6.0 Snapshots

name: v7.0.0
body: Upgrade to jdeb 1.8. This removes the 100 characters limitation for link names

name: v6.2.1
body: Fix #321 copydetails relative path outside sourceBase #332
Make Deb and Rpm tasks cacheable

name: v6.1.4
body: Fix support for configuration files in Debian plugin. #118

name: v5.3.0
body: Allow customization of default values for daemons definition. Allow customization of locations for daemon execution scripts. https://github.com/nebula-plugins/gradle-ospackage-plugin/wiki/How-to-provide-custom-daemon-default-values-and-script-locations

name: v5.2.0
body: Allow overriding templates for daemon scripts at a project level.

name: v6.1.1
body: Upgrade plugins

name: v6.0.0
body:
# Breaking change

Support only for Gradle 5.1+

* `CollectionCallbackActionDecorator` injection which doesn't exists in previous versions
* `AbstractArchiveTask` was modified to make use of Gradle's properties. Previously: https://github.com/gradle/gradle/blob/7fc6e5abf2fc5fe0824aec8a0f5462664dbcd987/subprojects/core/src/main/java/org/gradle/api/tasks/bundling/AbstractArchiveTask.java. Now: https://github.com/gradle/gradle/blob/master/subprojects/core/src/main/java/org/gradle/api/tasks/bundling/AbstractArchiveTask.java

name: v5.1.0
body: Allow to override daemon templates folder

name: v5.0.4
body: Update org.redline-rpm:redline to 1.2.7

name: v5.0.3
body: Update org.redline-rpm:redline to 1.2.7

name: v5.0.2
body: Upgrade plugins for groovy 2.5 support

name: Upgrade to Gradle 4.10.1
body: Upgrade to Gradle 4.10.1

Breaking change
===

Support only for Gradle 4.0+

name: v4.10.0
body: Compatibility with Gradle 4.9

name: v4.9.3
body: Compatibility with Gradle 4.8

name: v4.9.2
body: Compatibility with Gradle 4.8

name: v4.9.0-rc.2
body:
* Gradle 4.8-rc-2
* Update dependencies for Gradle 4.8 compatibility

name: v4.9.0-rc.1
body: * Backwards compatible fixes for gradle 4.8 nightly

name: v4.8.0
body: Adds `nebula.ospackage-application-spring-boot` plugin, bundling single-jar Spring Boot applications. Supports both Spring Boot 1.x and 2.x.

name: v4.7.5
body:
- Relativize symlinks within the package so they're work correctly no matter where the package is extracted
- Ensure that symlinked files within symlinked directories are not linked
- Fix path calculation issue that caused duplicate directory names in symlinks

name: v4.7.4
body: One more fix to path canonicalization

name: v4.7.3
body: Improve the absolute path logic based on testing

name: v4.7.2
body: Support relative symlinks

name: v4.7.1
body: Avoid non-backwards compatible RelativePath API

name: v4.7.0
body:
Additional improvements to symlink preservation:

- Don't attempt to link non-relative symlinks outside of the package specification
- Preserve directory symlinks
- Where a parent directory is a symlink, only link the parent

name: v4.6.0
body: Merged in PRs from multiple people

name: v4.5.1
body: Remove nebula.test-jar plugin

name: v4.5.0
body: Allow users to supply `installCmd` in `DaemonDefinition`

name: v4.4.2
body: Don't let `NoClassDefFoundException` bubble up due to use of Gradle 4.2 class.

name: v4.4.1
body: Fix deprecation warning on Gradle 4.2

name: v4.4.0
body:
* #58 - Preserve symlinks when building deb packages
* #80 - Invalid install commandline in postinst
* #102 - File ownership issues
* #114 - Create .changes file in addition to .deb file
* #144 - Distribution tag not applied
* #177 - DebPluginTest.groovy tests do not clean up after themselves)
* #213 - contains illegal character ~
* #231 - directory construct does not honour supplied user and permissionGroup for deb packages (contributed by @tonyabbott)
* #235 - run postinst script template generate when dirs
* Upgraded to Gradle 3.4

name: v4.3.0
body:
#203 - Do not create empty maintainer scripts for deb-package (contributed by @anlar)
#207 - extended RPM directory() with owner, group and addParents parameters (contributed by @sigmarw)
#218 - Mark MaintainerScripts with InputFile
#219 - Fixed issue with addParentDirs and createDirectoryEntry properties (contributed by @grkg8tr)

name: v4.2.0
body:
- #175 - Remove duplication of prefixes in RPM (contributed by @zunkree)
- #204 - Close file when creating RPM (contributed by @sc1478)
- #205 - Add changelogFile to RPM and upgrade redline (contributed by @sc1478)
- #216 - Set directory permissions with `dirMode` instead of `fileMode` when creating RPM (contributed by @vitaliusvs)
- Use Gradle 3.2

name: v4.1.0
body: Support File Directives from `ospackage` #211

name: v3.8.0
body: Support File Directives from `ospackage` #211

name: v4.0.0
body: Gradle 3.0 compatible release. Incompatible with earlier releases.

name: v3.7.1
body:
- Allow defining complete maintainer scripts for debians
- Don't force "nobody" group

name: v3.6.1
body: Publish a test jar

name: v3.6.0
body:
- nebula-ospackage-plugin plugins have been migrated to this plugin
- Support for dependency alternatives (contributed by @mxwell)
- Link class now works correctly as a task input, avoiding UP-TO-DATE when stale issues (contributed by @simplivity)
- Minor fix to RPM documentation (contributed by @ahadas)

name: v3.5.0
body:
- Added missing required() method (contribution by @wallner)
- Added preTrans and postTrans for RPM packages (contribution by @dwendelen)
- Update to Gradle 2.12

name: v3.4.0
body:
- Added directory capability for debs (contribution by @bi-)
- Added signing for debs (contribution by @dmnjohns)
- move to gradle 2.10

name: v3.3.0
body: - Make `provides` accept multiple values

name: v3.2.0
body: Sanitize version strings coming from java packages
